remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字符串的值是"目标不支持多部分文档"。The value of this string is "Target does not support multipart documents".

summary.span: 一个字符串，在对当前 控件的 属性发送了无效数据时用作错误消息。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字符串的值无效"的当前 ObjectList ViewMode 已发布数据。The value of this string is "Invalid posted data for current ObjectList ViewMode. （ObjectList 可能已经在回发时的数据绑定期间 Page_Load，重置 ViewMode。(The ObjectList may have been databound on postback during Page_Load, resetting the ViewMode. 调用数据绑定中 Page_Load 仅当 IsPostBack 为 false。）"Call DataBind in Page_Load only if IsPostBack is false.)"

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字符串的值为"样式表中不存在 id 查询字符串"。The value of this string is "Style sheet id not present in query string".

summary.span: 一个字符串，用于建议在获取 属性之前调用 方法。

span.span: A string to use to advise calling the method before getting the property.

summary.span: 此 API 已过时。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字符串的值是"必须在获取 CacheKey 之前调用 SetCacheKey"。The value of this string is "You must call SetCacheKey before getting the CacheKey".

summary.span: 一个字符串，用于建议在获取 属性之前调用 方法。

span.span: A string to use to advise calling the method before getting the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字符串的值是"必须在获取 SessionKey 之前调用 SetSessionKey"。The value of this string is "You must call SetSessionKey before getting the SessionKey".

summary.span: 一个字符串，在对当前 控件的 属性发送了无效数据时用作错误消息。

span.span: A string to use as an error message if invalid data was posted for the current control's property.

summary.span: 此 API 已过时。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字符串的值无效"的当前 ObjectList ViewMode 已发布数据。The value of this string is "Invalid posted data for current ObjectList ViewMode. （ObjectList 可能已经在回发时的数据绑定期间 Page_Load，重置 ViewMode。(The ObjectList may have been databound on postback during Page_Load, resetting the ViewMode. 调用数据绑定中 Page_Load 仅当 IsPostBack 为 false。）"Call DataBind in Page_Load only if IsPostBack is false.)"
